content:
-key part for seizing MS River
-coming down from TN ie coming down the MS River
-as he comes down, he seizes 2 confed forts, captures 14k dudes ^(numbers not really important)
	- ! POINT IS he has lots of success coming into battle of Shiloh

-grant gets to western TN, prepares for move on the MS River
-he camps, enjoys whiskey gambling ^(not really important)
	-some say he was up late with other generals drinking, playing cards, and THEREFORE WAS ILL PREPARED FOR CONFED SUPRISE ATTACK
		-threw union into disarray
